import React, { useRef, useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import '../../App.css'; import Footer from '../Footer' import CardItem from './CardItem'; export default function Chambres() { const chambresRef = useRef(null); const [currentSlide, setCurrentSlide] = useState(0); function nextSlide() { setCurrentSlide((currentSlide + 1) % images.length); } useEffect(() => { const interval = setInterval(() => { nextSlide(); }, 5000); return () => clearInterval(interval); }, [currentSlide]); const images = [ 'images/restau.jpg', 'images/rooftop.jpg', 'images/bar.jpg', ]; return (
